channel.title: I need help with making a command!
channel.description:
i need help making a command where if you type ::happyfriday you get a special item (which i add and remove on fridays but i want to make it so it gives a white party hat, says "Happy friday!" and can only use once or says "NOPE! Wait until next friday!" oh and i also need a starter command that gives 1 mill and can only be used twice, thanks!
thanks!

item.title: I need help with making a command!
item.dc:creator: @Adjacent Adjacent
item.description:
@Adjacent wrote:

that lets them use it more than once tho…

item.title: I need help with making a command!
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("command name")) { additem(itemid,amount) additem(itemid, amount) additem(itemid, amount) }
